jobTitle: Google Analytics (GA) and TeaLeaf Support and Data Analyst
jobDescription: USC & GCH ONLY No C2C  Chicago, IL Google Analytics, TeaLeaf, R & Pythonare key skill set required. Google Analytics (GA) and TeaLeaf Support and Data Analyst  Chicago, IL  Mandatory Technical / Functional Skills  Will be part of United Airlines' Digital Operations Center (DOC) team for monitoring and escalating critical system issues  Need to investigate GA dashboards and Tealeaf alerts and provide root cause analysis reports  Need to work on Data Analysis service requests using Big Query, Tableau, Tibco Spotfire, etc  6-8 years of experience in Google Analytics and TeaLeaf Monitoring and investigating any issues identified in GA and TeaLeaf  Experience in R and Python Development  Event and Alert configuration in GA & TeaLeaf  Knowledge on AppDynamics and other monitoring tools (like Dynatrace, New Relic,etc.,) for detailed investigation  Strong analytical and communication skills
